name: Novel: Pather Panchali
details: The main story starts with two siblings Durga aND Apu. They belong to a very poor family. The fight the poor people have to gone through was shown here so nicely.

name: Novel:Satkahon
details: This is a novel based on feminism where the main character Dipa always speaks for the womens right as human being

name: Science Fiction: Animan
details: There are some extra-ordinary people with extreme talent. an organization that is doing experiment on human being are capturing those type of talented peoples.The character LIDIA stood against them and fought back.

name: Science Fiction: Jol Manob
details: There are some people who live under a clan in the ocean. They believe surviving in the nature by adapting it rather than depending in the science and technology.But the human being started working against it.

name: Thriller: Bill Hickok
details: James Butler Hickok, better known as Wild Bill Hickok, was a folk hero of the American Old West known for his life on the frontier as a soldier, scout, lawman, gambler, showman, and actor, and for his involvement in many famous gunfights

name: Thriller: Death Trail
details: This is an western thriller book. The main character is a bounty hunter. He showed how to survive in critical situations where nobody can be trusted.
